channel.title: CacheDownloader Problem [Rep ++]
channel.description:
Hello I have posted a lot in the help sections but I am really new to coding. I have the general idea but I need help. I download the Reality-Scape source and client and I edited the sprites and backround in the cache part. I saved and compiled and it didn't work so I opened cachedownloader.java. There was 2 of them. I saw it had a download link in it so I edited the cache and made it perfect with my custom sprites, backgrounds, and customs models. I made everything to what it should be setup as. Then i want to dropbox, uploaded the zipped folder, and clicked get link. The link at the top looked wrong so I right clicked download and copied link address. I pasted it in where the other cache was and was feeling confident. I compiled cleanly. I compiled both source and client just in case. The when I went to run my client it game me a error relating to mapconfig or something. So i checked it out and the pictures will show you what came up. So my question is... how do I make the server accept my cache? The cache i put up for download:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/o6z9fq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/3136q9d.png[/img]

item.title: CacheDownloader Problem [Rep ++]
item.dc:creator: @reyes2303 reyes2303
item.description:
@reyes2303 wrote:

Yes I have done all of that.

Read full topic

item.title: CacheDownloader Problem [Rep ++]
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

Have you zipped it correctly?
Not the cache folder itself, inside of it.
If you have, is the name in signlink.java correct? Also make sure it is .ZIP not .RAR

Make sure you have done it all correctly.

Read full topic
